Table of Contents

Name


CplantSignalJob

Synopsis


#include <cplant.h> int CplantSignalJob(int sig, jobFamilyInfo *otherjob)\ fP

Description


The function CplantSignalJob causes the specified signal to be sent to all processes in the specified application. otherjob is a handle returned by CplantSpawnJob, CplantMyParent or CplantMySelf.

Return Value


This function return -1 on error, and 0 on success.

See Also


CplantSpawnJob CplantMyParent CplantMySelf
